description: Put on the same sock that pro freeskier Angel Collinson wears with her signature sock, the PhD® Pro Freeski. Using Collinson's insight, they built these socks with their Indestructawool™ technology for enhanced durability, their 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed, performance-oriented fit, and their Shred Shield™ technology for reduced wear from toes. Its design includes contoured shin and ankle cushioning with a flat knit toe box, as well as a wider welt for a secure fit and comfort. You won't get to Angel's level of skill without practice, but putting on the same sock that she chooses to wear is a good place to start.
name: Smartwool PhD Pro Freeski Socks - Mens
